name: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: An optimistic and energetic sea sponge who lives in a pineapple house under the sea. He works as a fry cook at the Krusty Krab.

name: Patrick Star
description: SpongeBob's best friend, a pink starfish who lives under a rock and is known for his silliness.

name: Squidward Tentacles
description: SpongeBob's grumpy neighbor and co-worker who plays the clarinet.

name: Mr. Krabs
description: The money-loving owner of the Krusty Krab, obsessed with wealth.

name: Plankton
description: Owner of the Chum Bucket and rival of Mr. Krabs, always scheming to steal the Krabby Patty formula.

name: Sandy Cheeks
description: A squirrel from Texas who lives underwater in a treedome and is skilled in karate and science.

name: Gary the Snail
description: SpongeBob's pet snail who communicates by meowing.

name: Pearl Krabs
description: Mr. Krabs' teenage whale daughter who loves shopping and cheerleading.

name: Mrs. Puff
description: The boating school teacher who constantly suffers because of SpongeBob's driving.

name: Mermaid Man
description: An elderly superhero and childhood idol of SpongeBob and Patrick.

name: Barnacle Boy
description: Mermaid Man's loyal sidekick who is often annoyed by being treated like a child.

name: Flying Dutchman
description: A green ghostly pirate who haunts Bikini Bottom.

name: Larry the Lobster
description: A muscular lobster and lifeguard at Goo Lagoon.

name: Bubble Bass
description: A large fish known for tricking SpongeBob and being picky with his food orders.

name: Man Ray
description: The archenemy of Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy.

name: Krusty Krab
description: The most popular fast-food restaurant in Bikini Bottom, famous for its Krabby Patties.

name: Chum Bucket
description: Plankton's unpopular restaurant located across from the Krusty Krab.

name: SpongeBob's House
description: SpongeBob's pineapple-shaped home with a library and backyard.

name: Squidward's House
description: A moai-style house where Squidward lives, right next to SpongeBob.

name: Patrick's Rock
description: Patrick's simple rock house, which he lifts like a lid.

name: Mrs. Puff's Boating School
description: The boating school where SpongeBob repeatedly fails his driving tests.

name: Goo Lagoon
description: A popular beach where the residents of Bikini Bottom relax and swim.

name: Krabby Patty
description: The iconic burger from the Krusty Krab, known for its secret formula.

name: Jellyfishing Net
description: A simple net used by SpongeBob and Patrick to catch jellyfish.

name: Magic Pencil
description: A magical pencil that brings drawings to life.

name: Bubble Wand
description: A wand SpongeBob uses to blow creative bubbles.

name: Golden Spatula
description: A legendary spatula often used as a collectible in SpongeBob games.

name: Bubble Bowl
description: A legendary stadium event where SpongeBob and his friends performed 'Sweet Victory'.

name: Fry Cook Games
description: An Olympic-style competition for fry cooks in Bikini Bottom.

name: Jellyfishing Trip
description: A popular pastime where SpongeBob and Patrick catch jellyfish.

name: Boating Exam
description: The boating license test that SpongeBob constantly fails.

name: Best Day Ever
description: A cheerful day planned by SpongeBob that goes hilariously wrong.
